attributes.action: Ensure all elections scheduled for May 2026 go ahead
attributes.additional_details: Elections are a fundamental democratic right, not something that can be postponed for political convenience. Cancelling or delaying scheduled elections would undermine public trust, weaken accountability, and deny voters their say. In a democracy, power comes from the ballot box and elections must go ahead as planned.
attributes.background: I want the government to announce that all elections in the UK scheduled for May 2026 go ahead. We live in a democracy, and the people should have their say on who represents them at every level.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition instead, which is already open:

Stop the cancellation of Local Elections to help uphold democracy
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751384

There is also one on banning any further cancellations:

Remove power to cancel local government elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/747234
